julia> W = rand(2, 3); x = rand(3);

julia> gradient((W, x) -> sum(W*x), W, x)

julia> gradient(W -> sum(W*x), W)
([0.7710948455550949 0.6754845916076843 0.9454955655619915; 0.7710948455550949 0.6754845916076843 0.9454955655619915],)
